title: Journal of a tour through the Highlands of Scotland during the summer of MDCCCXXIX.
author: Botfield, Beriah
snippet: Its environs arepleasantly studded with vinas,many of which we sawon leaving the town for the Carse of Gowrie ; uponour entrance to which, beyond Balgay, the ruinedkirk and burying-ground of Invergowrie appearedon the bay of the same name.
